name: Light: The Tale Of Darkness
description:
Restless and alone, a young boy named Light finds himself trapped in a dream world that feels all too real. In this dark and dangerous place, Light must battle against his deepest fears and face off against sinister monsters of the Junkanoo and Darkness itself.

In Light: The Tale of Darkness, players will take on the role of Light and guide him on his journey to freedom. Armed only with his wits, Light must fight his way through each level, defeating enemies and collecting keys that unlock the path to his escape.
